Rewards Rate: 1% cash back or 8 Reward Points on every retail spend of Rs. 200 (choose between rewards/cashback).
Reward Redemption: The Reward Points can be redeemed against various options via the YesRewardz portal where 1 Reward Point = up to Re. 0.25.
Travel: Complimentary airport lounge access every quarter.
Domestic Lounge Access: 1 complimentary domestic lounge access every quarter.
Golf: 4 complimentary rounds of golf every year.

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% surcharge waiver on fuel transactions between Rs. 400 and Rs. 5,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawn amount subject to a minimum of Rs. 300.

product_details: Cardholders have an option to choose either cashback or rewards.
You get 1% cash back or 8 Reward Points on every spend of Rs. 200.
You can choose a cashback plan to earn accelerated cash back on the merchants of your choice.
Complimentary rounds of golf every month.
1% fuel surcharge waiver on all fuel transactions.
